<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Key Collection">3c73c42a2fde5110b63859a72799b6bd</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7dc38c2a2fde5110b63859a72799b66c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Email</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
                   
    }
	
	var abc= g_form.getValue('u_reference_1');
	alert(abc);
	g_form.setValue('email',abc);
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    gr.addQuery('sys_id',abc);
    gr.query();
        while (gr.next()){
			g_form.setValue("email","ABC");
			alert(email);
		}
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>1234</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-05 07:48:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a28f44e62f129110b63859a72799b633</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Email</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Icloud Real Estate" source="x_874730_icloud_re">a8b4523b2f061110b63859a72799b6b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Icloud Real Estate">a8b4523b2f061110b63859a72799b6b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a28f44e62f129110b63859a72799b633</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>1234</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-05 08:06:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
